metadata.description: Custom Claude Code skills and tools

plugins.name: auto-ralph
plugins.description: Proactively detects tasks suitable for Ralph Loop iteration. Auto-scores tasks, generates prompts, and executes with configurable iterations.

plugins.name: orchestrator
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration with task decomposition, parallel execution, and smart agent routing. Commands: /orchestrate, /parallel, /plan-only

plugins.name: audit-agent
plugins.description: Multi-framework audit agent: Jobs (design simplification), Carlin (BS detection), Vibe (engineering quality). Auto-detects contexts. Commands: /jobs-audit, /carlin-audit, /vibe-audit, /multi-audit

plugins.name: debate
plugins.description: Multi-model adversarial debate. Claude defends positions against external CLI models (Gemini, Codex, Qwen). Requires at least 1 external CLI. Produces tradeoff documents exposing hidden assumptions. Commands: /debate, /debate:doctor, /debate:adr

plugins.name: statusline
plugins.description: Premium powerline-style statusline for Claude Code with git status, context window, and model info
